name: Space Runner Prototype Game
description:
An endless runner prototype game set in space made using Unity, the main goal is to survive as long as possible by dodging asteroids to achieve a high score.

Controls:

Left Key = Move left

Right Key = Move right 

ESC Key = Open pause menu 

Music: https://www.bensound.com/

Game volume is fairly loud so make sure your volume isn't too high!
